content: crochet molly the mouse with this easy free amigurumi crochet pattern great for beginners including full detailed video tutorial that helps you with every step this is a small crochet project you can make it within an hour great last minute gift use any yarn you like create a small keychain sized mouse 5 cm / 2 inch with sport weight cotton yarn or make a larger plush version 11 cm / 4 inch using super bulky chenille yarn the pattern includes a full video tutorial to guide you through making this adorable mouse amigurumi link to free written pattern https //www mariskavos nl/free-mouse-crochet-pattern/ link to video tutorial https //youtu be/efvltjvkspm
